title: Wearable Technology -- Modern Marvel or Invasion of Privacy?
description:
Wearable Technology.  Have personal computers become too close for comfort? Raj Nair gets the cyber-scoop from The HotList's Amy Holmes.

Watch full episodes of Dana on demand with a subscription to TheBlaze TV: http://www.video.theblaze.com/shows/index.j
